org.sxb.aop

クラス Invocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.aop.Invocation

  • public class Invocation
extends java.lang.Object
    Invocation is used to invoke the interceptors and the target method 调用类，通常用来调用拦截器跟控制类方法

    • コンストラクタの概要

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      Invocation(Action action, Controller controller) 
      Invocation(java.lang.Object target, java.lang.reflect.Method method, java.lang.Object[] args, net.sf.cglib.proxy.MethodProxy methodProxy, Interceptor[] inters) 

    • メソッドの概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      java.lang.String getActionKey()
      Return the action key.
      java.lang.Object getArg(int index) 
      java.lang.Object[] getArgs() 
      Controller getController()
      Return the controller of this action.
      java.lang.String getControllerKey()
      Return the controller key.
      java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod()
      Return the method of this action.
      java.lang.String getMethodName()
      Return the method name of this action's method.
      <T> T getReturnValue()
      Get the return value of the target method
      <T> T getTarget()
      Get the target object which be intercepted Example: OrderService os = getTarget();
      java.lang.String getViewPath()
      Return view path of this controller.
      void invoke() 
      boolean isActionInvocation()
      return true if it is action invocation.
      void setArg(int index, java.lang.Object value) 
      void setReturnValue(java.lang.Object returnValue)
      Set the return value of the target method

      • クラスから継承されたメソッド java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

                  Controller controller)

    • メソッドの詳細

      • invoke

        public void invoke()

      • getArg

        public java.lang.Object getArg(int index)

      • setArg

        public void setArg(int index,
                   java.lang.Object value)

      • getArgs

        public java.lang.Object[] getArgs()

      • getTarget

        public <T> T getTarget()
        Get the target object which be intercepted 
         Example:
 OrderService os = getTarget();

      • getMethod

        public java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod()
        Return the method of this action.

        You can getMethod.getAnnotations() to get annotation on action method to do more things

      • getMethodName

        public java.lang.String getMethodName()
        Return the method name of this action's method.

      • getReturnValue

        public <T> T getReturnValue()
        Get the return value of the target method

      • setReturnValue

        public void setReturnValue(java.lang.Object returnValue)
        Set the return value of the target method

      • getController

        public Controller getController()
        Return the controller of this action.

      • getActionKey

        public java.lang.String getActionKey()
        Return the action key. actionKey = controllerKey + methodName

      • getControllerKey

        public java.lang.String getControllerKey()
        Return the controller key.

      • getViewPath

        public java.lang.String getViewPath()
        Return view path of this controller.

      • isActionInvocation

        public boolean isActionInvocation()
        return true if it is action invocation.
